mapper.select: select b.boa_snum boa_snum, b.boa_imgpng boa_imgpng, b.boa_subject boa_subject, b.boa_context boa_context, b.boa_regdate boa_regdate, m.mem_snum mem_snum, m.mem_id mem_id, m.mem_profile mem_profile, b.boa_category from board b, member m where b.mem_snum = m.mem_snum and m.mem_id = #{mem_id} order by b.boa_snum desc, b.boa_regdate desc
select b.boa_category from member m, board b where b.mem_snum = m.mem_snum and m.mem_id = #{mem_id } GROUP BY b.boa_category
select cat_name boa_category from categorylist GROUP BY CAT_NAME

select b.boa_snum, b.boa_subject, b.boa_regdate, b.boa_hitcnt, m.mem_snum,m.mem_id, b.boa_imgpng, m.mem_profile, lc.boa_injeong, b.boa_category from board b, member m, (select b.boa_snum, count(l.boa_snum) boa_injeong from board b, likelist l where b.boa_snum = l.boa_snum(+) group by b.boa_snum) lc where b.boa_snum = #{boa_snum} and b.mem_snum = m.mem_snum and lc.BOA_SNUM=b.BOA_snum

select c.com_snum, c.com_context, c.com_regdate, b.boa_snum, m.mem_id, m.mem_profile from board_comment c, board b, member m where b.boa_snum = #{boa_snum} and b.boa_snum = c.boa_snum and c.mem_snum = m.mem_snum order by c.com_snum desc
mapper.insert: insert into board_comment (com_snum, boa_snum, com_context, mem_snum, com_regdate) values (seq_com_snum.nextval, #{boa_snum}, #{com_context}, #{mem_snum}, sysdate)
mapper.select: select b.boa_snum, count(l.boa_snum) boa_injeong from board b, likelist l where b.boa_snum = l.boa_snum(+) and b.boa_snum = #{boa_snum} group by b.boa_snum
mapper.delete: delete from likelist where mem_snum = #{mem_snum} and boa_snum = #{boa_snum}
mapper.update: update board set boa_hitcnt = boa_hitcnt + 1 where boa_snum = #{boa_snum}
mapper.select: select b.boa_snum, b.boa_imgpng, b.boa_subject, b.boa_regdate, m.mem_snum, m.mem_id, m.mem_profile from board b, member m, likelist l where m.mem_id = #{mem_id} and b.boa_snum = l.boa_snum and m.mem_snum = b.mem_snum and sysdate - l.lkl_regdate < 7
select count(b.boa_subject) boa_count from board b, member m where b.mem_snum = m.mem_snum and m.mem_id = #{mem_id}
select b.boa_snum, b.boa_subject, b.boa_imgpng, m.mem_id, b.BOA_CATEGORY from board b, member m, fri_list f where f.mem_snum=#{mem_snum } and b.mem_snum=m.mem_snum and b.mem_snum = f.FRI_MEM_SNUM
select b.boa_category from member m, board b, likelist l where b.mem_snum = m.mem_snum and b.boa_snum = l.boa_snum and m.mem_id =#{mem_id } and sysdate - l.lkl_regdate < 7 group by b.boa_category

select b.boa_snum boa_snum, b.boa_imgpng boa_imgpng, b.boa_subject boa_subject, b.boa_context boa_context, b.boa_regdate boa_regdate, m.mem_snum mem_snum, m.mem_id mem_id, m.mem_profile mem_profile, b.boa_category from board b, member m, likelist l where b.mem_snum = m.mem_snum and m.mem_id = #{mem_id} and b.boa_snum = l.boa_snum and b.boa_category = #{boa_category} and sysdate - l.lkl_regdate < 7 order by b.boa_snum desc, b.boa_regdate desc

select b.boa_snum, b.boa_subject, b.boa_imgpng, m.mem_id, b.BOA_CATEGORY from board b, taglist t, member m where (b.BOA_SUBJECT like '%'||#{keyword }||'%' or t.TAG_NAME like '%'||#{keyword }||'%') and b.BOA_SNUM=t.BOA_SNUM(+) and b.MEM_SNUM=m.MEM_SNUM
mapper.update: update board set boa_subject = #{boa_subject}, boa_imgpng = #{boa_imgpng}, boa_category = #{boa_category} where boa_snum=#{boa_snum}
